Author: WigglyMuffin, CryoTechnic
Description:
The actively maintained and improved quest helper plugin for a smoother questing experience.

This plugin automates quests with enhanced pathing, reliable combat integration (e.g., Boss Mod and Wrath Combo), and consistent stability. It leverages tools like Vnavmesh for precise navigation, LifeStream for efficient travel, and TextAdvance for dialogue handling, keeping pace with game updates and user needs.

Originally created by Liza Carvelli.
Name: Questionable
Punchline: The ultimate quest helper plugin, actively maintained and feature-packed.

Author: WigglyMuffin
Description:
Uploads your game statistics (such as quest progress, gil, retainer stats) to an InfluxDB or QuestDB instance, making it possible to automatically track your progress through external tools such as Grafana.

Originally created by Liza Carvelli.
Name: Influx
Punchline: Sync game stats to InfluxDB or QuestDB

Author: MacaronDream
Description:
Automated character rotation and quest sequence execution for Questionable.

Automates multi-character MSQ progression by intelligently switching between characters based on quest completion and level requirements. Features include:
- Automatic character switching and quest tracking
- MSQ progression monitoring across all characters
- Allied Society quest rotation and prioritization
- Event quest automation with prerequisite checking
- Chauffeur Mode for following main character through quests
- Data Center travel automation
- Stop point configuration for controlled progression

Required Plugins: Questionable, AutoRetainer
Name: Questionable Companion
Punchline: Automated character rotation and quest sequence execution
